long_description: The Swix LF12 Fluorocarbon Glide Wax multi-pack gives you the wax you need for various snow conditions. It includes 20g of LF6 blue, 20g of LF7 violet and 20g of LF8 red. LF6 is a base conditioning wax for cold-weather riding, or a great base layer for other waxes; this wax is rated for 10degF to 21degF. LF7 is an ideal base layer wax, and a great all-around wax for colder days with low humidity; this wax is rated for 18degF to 28degF. LF8 keeps your base in optimal condition, and is an excellent wax for mild weather days; this wax is rated for 25degF to 34degF.
short_description: The Swix LF12 Fluorocarbon Glide Wax multi-pack gives you the wax you need for various snow conditions. It includes 20g of LF6 blue, 20g of LF7 violet and 20g of LF8 red.
